abstract: Clorox said a $10.2 billion takeover bid by Carl C. Icahn was “neither credible nor adequate.” The company also implemented a poison-pill plan.
snippet: Clorox said a $10.2 billion takeover bid by Carl C. Icahn was “neither credible nor adequate.” The company also implemented a poison-pill plan.
lead_paragraph: Clorox said on Monday that its board had rejected a $10.2 billion takeover bid by the investor Carl C. Icahn.

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
